author: MSNBC
title: Trump's subpoena obstruction has fractured the Constitution's system of checks and balances
description: Trump, AG Barr and GOP lawmakers have fractured the Constitution's system of checks and balances by refusing to comply to Democratic subpoenas
content:
Kurt Bardella Trump's subpoena obstruction has fractured the Constitution's system of checks and balances

Millions of Americans voted in favor of a stronger check on power by ushering in a new Democratic majority in the House. That mandate is being ignored.
